name.Raid on the British Men of Letters compo: Raid on the British Men of Letters compound
name.Lockdown of the Men of Letters bunker: Lockdown of the Men of Letters bunker

image.Capture of Arthur and Charlie: [[File:AU Castiel about to torture AU Charlie.jpg|250px]]

caption.The Apocalypse: The world in 2014, at the climax of hostilities

result.The Apocalypse:
Alliance victory
*Defeat and re-imprisonment of Lucifer
*Imprisonment of Michael
*Death of [[Zachariah]] and several other angels
*Beginning of hostilities between Castiel and the angelic government of Heaven
result.Battle of the Devil's Gate:
*Death of [[Azazel]]
*[[Devil's Gate]] opened
*Hundreds of demons including [[Lilith]] released
result.Battle of SucroCorp:
*[[Dick Roman]] is killed
*The Leviathans are defeated
*[[Kevin Tran]] is [[First Capture of Kevin Tran|kidnapped]] by [[Crowley]]
*[[Dean Winchester]] and [[Castiel]] get stuck in [[Purgatory]]
*[[Meg Masters (Demon)|Meg]] is captured by [[Crowley]]
result.Raising of Adam Milligan:
*[[Zachariah]] is killed
*[[Castiel]] loses his powers
*[[Adam Milligan]] becomes [[Michael]]'s [[vessel]]
result.Hunt for the Angel Tablet:
*The [[Angel Tablet]] is taken by [[Castiel]]
*[[Naomi]]'s hold over Castiel is broken
*[[Meg Masters (Demon)|Meg]] is killed
result.Kidnapping of Colette Mullen:
*All the [[Knights of Hell]] except [[Abaddon]] killed
*[[Cain]] retires at [[Colette Mullen|his wife's]] request
result.Hunt for Kevin Tran:
*Translation of the [[Leviathan Tablet]]
*[[Bone of Righteous Mortal Washed in the Three Bloods of Fallen|An effective weapon]] against the [[Leviathans]] is discovered
*[[Kevin Tran]] is kidnapped by [[Edgar]]
result.Raising of Dean Winchester:
*[[Dean Winchester]] rescued from [[Hell]] and [[resurrection|resurrected]]
*The Winchesters learn of the existence of [[angels]]
*War of the Seals begins
result.Metatron's Suicide Bombings:
*All unaffiliated factions join with [[Metatron]]
*[[Castiel's Faction]] joins with [[Metatron]]
*[[Gadreel]] defects to [[Castiel]]'s side
result.Battle with Metatron:
*The [[Angel Tablet]] is shattered
*[[Dean Winchester]] is killed and turned into a [[demon]]
*[[Metatron]] loses his deity abilities
*[[Metatron]] is overthrown and imprisoned in [[Heaven's dungeon]]
*[[Heaven]] is retaken by the [[angels]]
*[[Soul]]s can now enter Heaven again
result.Battle of Linwood Memorial Hospital:
*[[Rogue Angel]] killed
*[[Kim Schortz Angel]] and [[Farmer Angel]] [[angel banishing sigil|banished]]
*[[Gadreel]] takes [[Sam]] as a [[vessel]] to save him
result.Hunt for Castiel:
*[[Castiel]] becomes [[Angel Ward|warded]] against angels sensing him
*[[Castiel]] killed and [[resurrection|resurrected]] again
*[[Gadreel]] forces [[Dean]] to make [[Castiel]] leave the [[Men of Letters bunker]]
result.Fall of the Angels:
*The [[angels]] are [[Expelling Angels|expelled]] from [[Heaven]]
*The angels lose [[Angel's Wings|their wings]]
*[[Metatron]] gains control of Heaven
*[[Castiel]] loses his [[grace]] and becomes [[human]]
*The [[angels]] are left close to extinction
result.Hunt for the First Blade:
*All of [[Abaddon]]'s demons killed
*[[Dean]] receives the [[Mark of Cain]]
*[[Cuthbert Sinclair]] is killed
*[[The First Blade]] is found
*[[Cain]] goes back to his old ways
result.Battle of the Humboldt Hotel:
*[[Abaddon]] is killed
*[[Crowley]] regains full control of [[Hell]]
*[[Dean]] starts falling further under the influence of the [[Mark of Cain]]
result.Battle between Bartholomew and Malachi:
*Both sides inflict casualties upon each other
*[[Bartholomew's Faction]] and [[Malachi's Faction]] go to war
result.Second Capture of Castiel:
*[[Castiel]] escapes and steals [[Theo]]'s [[grace]]
*Castiel becomes an angel again
*Castiel warns [[Dean]] that [[Ezekiel]] is dead
result.Assassination of Kevin Tran:
*[[Kevin Tran]] is murdered by [[Gadreel]]
*[[Gadreel]] takes full control of [[Sam Winchester]]
*[[Gadreel]] steals the [[Angel Tablet|angel]] and [[Demon Tablet|demon tablets]]
*[[Gadreel]] becomes [[Metatron]]'s second-in-command
result.Leviathan War:
*[[Bobby Singer]] is killed
*[[Leviathans]] nearly turn humanity into a perfect food source
*[[Leviathans]] are defeated with the death of [[Dick Roman]]
result.Hunt for Dean Winchester:
*[[Abaddon]] [[Abaddon Loyalists|loyalists]] killed
*[[Cole Trenton]] learns about [[demons]]
*[[Dean Winchester]] captured and [[Demon Curing Ritual|cured]]
*[[Crowley]] gains possession of [[the First Blade]]
result.Kidnapping of Future Prophets:
*Surviving future [[Prophet]]s and [[Kevin Tran]] rescued
*The Winchesters and [[Crowley]] each get half of the [[Demon Tablet]]
result.Styne Family Massacre:
*American branch of the [[Styne Family]] wiped out
*[[Dean]] falls further under the influence of the [[Mark of Cain]]
result.Raid on the British Men of Letters compo:
*Death of the [[Alpha Vampire]]
*Apparent end of [[Project V]]
*[[Sam Winchester]] signs on with the [[British Men of Letters]] operation
result.Lockdown of the Men of Letters bunker:
*The Winchesters and [[Lady Toni Bevell]] escape
*Lady Toni Bevell switches sides
result.Assault on the British Men of Letters co:
*Destruction of the [[British Men of Letters]] operation in America
*Revelation of the escape of [[Lucifer]]
result.Sheriff's Station Siege:
*[[Monument Townspeople]] saved from [[possession]]
*[[Deputy Demon|One]] [[demon]] escapes to warn [[Lilith]]
*[[Victor Henriksen]] declares the Winchesters dead
*[[Lilith]] later returns to torture the survivors to death
result.Raising of Lucifer:
*Deaths of [[Lilith]] and [[Ruby]]
*[[66 Seals|The last seal]] breaks
*[[Lucifer]] escapes [[Lucifer's Cage|his Cage]]
*[[The Apocalypse]] begins
result.Battle of Prentiss Island:
*[[Vampirates]] wiped out
*[[Benny Lafitte|Benny]] gets his [[revenge]]
*Benny learns the truth about what happened to [[Andrea Kormos]]
result.Skirmish at the Heavenly Portal:
*[[Dagon]] killed
*[[Castiel]] departs to protect [[Kelly Kline]] and [[Jack (Nephilim)|Jack]], having gained faith in Jack
result.Hunt for Anna Milton:
*[[Anna Milton]] becomes an [[angel]] again
*[[Alastair]] is [[Death Takes A Holiday|falsely]] believed killed
result.Operation: Lee Harvey:
*Failure to kill [[Castiel]]
*[[Gadreel]] begins to develop doubts about following [[Metatron]]
result.Capture of Ezra:
*Revelation of [[Metatron]]'s ground force, elite squad and the [[Heavenly Portal]]
*Murder of [[Ezra]] by [[Josiah]]
result.Second Possession of Sam Winchester:
*[[Gadreel]] expelled from [[Sam Winchester]]
*A rift develops between the Winchesters
*[[Crowley]] begins actively resisting [[Abaddon]]
result.Special Children Competition:
*All of the [[Special Children]] except [[Jake Talley]] wiped out
*[[Sam Winchester]] killed
result.Murders of Akobel and May:
*[[Akobel]] and [[May]] are murdered under the pretense that May is a [[Nephilim]]
*[[Lily Sunder]] becomes vengeful against [[Ishim]] and [[Angel Garrison#Ishim's Garrison|his garrison]]
result.Hunt for Barthamus' bones:
*[[Barthamus' bones]] burned by [[Alice (The Scorpion and The Frog)|Alice]]
*Deaths of both [[Luther Shrike]] and [[Barthamus]]
*[[Alice (The Scorpion and The Frog)|Alice's]] deal is broken
*[[Nephilim]] [[tracking spell]] destroyed
result.Skirmish at Chuck's house:
*Death of [[Castiel]]
*[[Angel banishing sigil|Banishment]] of [[Zachariah]] and [[Zachariah's Foot-Soldiers|his henchmen]]
result.The Apocalypse (Apocalypse World):
*Death of [[Lucifer (Apocalypse World)|Lucifer]]
*Ruination of the [[Earth]]
*[[Angels]] engage in genocide of the [[human]] race
*[[Exodus from Apocalypse World|Exodus]] of dozens of people to the Main Universe
*Death of [[Gabriel]]
*Departure of [[Michael (Apocalypse World)|Michael]] to the Main Universe
*Death of the Main Universe [[Lucifer]]
*Michael is let loose upon the Main Universe in [[Dean Winchester|his true vessel]]
result.Liberation of the Silo:
*[[The Silo]] liberated
*All prisoners freed
*[[Charlie Bradbury (Apocalypse World)|Charlie Bradbury]] rescued
result.Demon Incursion of the Men of Letters Bu:
*Death of [[Asmodeus]]
*Extinction of the [[Princes of Hell]]
*[[Gabriel]] absconds from his responsibility once more and departs
result.Rescue of Gabriel:
*[[Gabriel]] rescued
*The [[Archangel Blade]] and [[Asmodeus]]' store of Gabriel's extracted [[grace]] stolen
*The Winchesters gain Gabriel, the Archangel Blade and Gabriel's grace
result.Capture of Arthur and Charlie:
*Rescue of [[Arthur Ketch]] and [[Charlie Bradbury (Apocalypse World)|Charlie Bradbury]]
*Death of [[Castiel (Apocalypse World)|Alternate Castiel]]
result.Battle of the Abandoned Church:
*Death of [[Lucifer]]
*[[Dean]] becomes the [[vessel]] for [[Apocalypse World]] [[Michael (Apocalypse World)|Michael]]
*Michael takes full control of Dean's body and departs
*Release of [[Nick]] from Lucifer's control
result.Exodus from Apocalypse World:
*Exodus of dozens of people to the Main Universe
*Successful rescue of [[Mary Winchester]] and [[Jack (Nephilim)|Jack]] from [[Apocalypse World]]
*Death of [[Gabriel]]
*[[Lucifer]] forms an alliance with [[Apocalypse World]] [[Michael (Apocalypse World)|Michael]]
result.Capture of Lucifer:
*[[Lucifer]] captured
*Lucifer's extracted [[grace]] is use to fuel the rift
*The Winchesters, Castiel, and Gabriel journey to Apocalypse World
result.Hunt for the Alpha's blood:
*Defeat of [[Edgar]]
*Rescue of [[Allan]]
*The Winchesters get the [[Alpha Vampire]]'s [[Alpha's blood|blood]]
*The Winchesters are left one step closer to completing [[Bone of Righteous Mortal Washed in the Three Bloods of Fallen|their weapon]]
*[[Bobby Singer]] becomes a [[Vengeful Spirit]]
